ability.name: The Darkin Blade
ability.description: [Champion] slams his greatsword down, dealing physical damage. He can swing three times, each with a different area of effect.

ability.name: Spirit Rush
ability.description: [Champion] dashes forward and fires essence bolts, damaging nearby enemies. Spirit Rush can be cast up to three times before going on cooldown, and gains additional recasts when taking down enemy champions.

ability.name: Shuriken Flip
ability.description: Flip backward and fire a shuriken forward, dealing magic damage. The first enemy or smoke cloud hit is marked. Re-cast to dash to the marked target, dealing additional damage.

Akshan.name: Akshan
Akshan.title: the Rogue Sentinel
Akshan.quote: "Fixing the world, one scoundrel at a time!"

ability.name: Comeuppance
ability.description: [Champion] locks onto an enemy champion and starts storing bullets. When released, he fires all stored bullets, dealing damage based on missing health to the first champion, minion, or structure hit.

ability.name: Pulverize
ability.description: [Champion] smashes the ground, dealing damage to nearby enemies and tossing them into the air.

ability.name: Cunning Sweep / Sundering Slam
ability.description: [Champion] sweeps her twin drakehounds in a semicircle in front of her, dealing bonus damage to enemies hit by the blades. Striking an enemy will transform the next cast of this ability for a short period of time, causing her to slam her twin drakehounds down in a line in front of her, dealing bonus damage to the first enemy hit.

ability.name: Despair
ability.description: Overcome by anguish, nearby enemies lose a percentage of their maximum Health each second and have their Curses refreshed.

ability.name: Flash Frost
ability.description: [Champion] brings her wings together and summons a sphere of ice that flies towards her opponents, chilling and damaging anyone in its path. When the sphere explodes it does moderate damage in a radius, stunning anyone in the area.

Annie.name: Annie
Annie.title: the Dark Child
Annie.quote: "You wanna play too? It'll be fun!"

ability.name: Molten Shield
ability.description: Grants [Champion] or an ally a shield, a burst of Move Speed, and damages enemies who strike her with attacks or spells.

ability.name: Phase
ability.description: [Champion] swaps his main-hand gun with his off-hand gun, replacing his basic attack and activated ability.

ability.name: Volley
ability.description: [Champion] fires arrows in a cone for increased damage. Also applies Frost Shot.

ability.name: The Weirding
ability.description: [Champion] converges the realms, sending out a blast of spirit magic that damages and slows enemies before [Champion] hops backward to safety.

ability.name: Shifting Sands
ability.description: [Champion] shields himself briefly and dashes to one of his Sand Soldiers, damaging enemies. If he hits an enemy champion, he instantly readies a new Sand Soldier for deployment and halts his dash.

Bard.name: Bard
Bard.title: the Wandering Caretaker
Bard.quote: Bard lets a  Meep onto his shoulder and lets it run to and fro across his arms.

ability.name: Tempered Fate
ability.description: [Champion] sends spirit energy arcing to a location, putting all champions, minions, monsters, and turrets hit into stasis for a brief time.

ability.name: Overdrive
ability.description: [Champion] super charges themself to get dramatically increased Move and Attack Speed. They are temporarily slowed after the effect ends.

Brand.name: Brand
Brand.title: the Burning Vengeance
Brand.quote: "Ready to set the world on fire? Heheheh..."

ability.name: Pyroclasm
ability.description: [Champion] unleashes a devastating torrent of fire that bounces up to 5 times off of [Champion] and nearby enemies, dealing magic damage to enemies each time bounce. Bounces prioritize stacking Blaze to max on Champions. If a target is ablaze, Pyroclasm will briefly slow them.

ability.name: Glacial Fissure
ability.description: [Champion] slams the ground, knocking up enemies nearby and in a line in front of him. A fissure is left along the line that slows enemies.

Briar.name: Briar
Briar.title: the Restrained Hunger
Briar.quote: "Nice to meet you! I'm hungry. I mean... Briar!"

ability.name: Head Rush
ability.description: [Champion] leaps to a unit and hits enemies with The Heel Wheel (of Pain), stunning them and breaking their Armor.

Caitlyn.name: Caitlyn
Caitlyn.title: the Sheriff of Piltover
Caitlyn.quote: "Shall I turn in my badge and rifle as well?"

ability.name: Ace in the Hole
ability.description: [Champion] takes time to line up the perfect shot, dealing massive damage to a single target at a huge range. Enemy champions can intercept the bullet for their ally.

Camille.name: Camille
Camille.title: the Steel Shadow
Camille.quote: "Precision is the difference between a butcher and a surgeon."

ability.name: Precision Protocol
ability.description: [Champion]'s next attack deals bonus damage and grants bonus Move Speed. This spell can be recast for a short period of time, doing significantly increased bonus damage if [Champion] delays a period of time between the two attacks.

ability.name: Twin Fang
ability.description: [Champion] lets loose an attack that deals increased damage to Poisoned targets and heals her for a percentage of the damage dealt. If the target dies from this attack, [Champion] regains Mana.

Corki.name: Corki
Corki.title: the Daring Bombardier
Corki.quote: "I'm up to snuff, and gots me an ace machine!"

ability.name: Valkyrie
ability.description: [Champion] flies a short distance, dropping bombs that create a trail of fire that damages opponents who remain in it.

ability.name: Crippling Strike
ability.description: [Champion]'s next attack strikes an enemy's crucial artery. As they bleed out, their Move Speed is slowed.

ability.name: Pale Cascade
ability.description: [Champion] creates three orbiting spheres that detonate on contact with enemies to deal damage in an area. She also gains a temporary shield that absorbs damage. If her third sphere detonates, the shield gains additional strength.

ability.name: Stand Aside
ability.description: [Champion] throws his axes, dealing physical damage to targets hit and knocking them aside. Targets hit are slowed.

Ekko.name: Ekko
Ekko.title: the Boy Who Shattered Time
Ekko.quote: "It's not how much time you have, it's how you use it."

ability.name: Timewinder
ability.description: [Champion] throws a temporal grenade that expands into a time-distortion field upon hitting an enemy champion, slowing and damaging anyone caught inside. After a delay, the grenade rewinds back to [Champion], dealing damage on its return.

Elise.name: Elise
Elise.title: the Spider Queen
Elise.quote: "Only the spider is safe in her web."

ability.name: Neurotoxin / Venomous Bite
ability.description: Human Form: Deals damage based upon how high the target's Health is.Spider Form: Lunges at an enemy and deals damage based upon how low their Health is.

ability.name: Last Caress
ability.description: [Champion] briefly goes untargetable and decimates the area in front of her before warping backwards a long distance.

ability.name: Trueshot Barrage
ability.description: [Champion] winds up before firing a powerful barrage of energy that deals massive damage to each unit it passes through (damage is reduced for minions and non-epic monsters).

Fiddlesticks.name: Fiddlesticks
Fiddlesticks.title: the Ancient Fear
Fiddlesticks.quote: A stripped-down version of Star Guardian 2022's orchestral theme plays.

ability.name: Bountiful Harvest
ability.description: [Champion] drains health from nearby enemies, dealing bonus execute damage at the end of the duration.

ability.name: Riposte
ability.description: [Champion] parries all incoming damage and disables for a short time, then stabs in a direction. This stab slows the first enemy champion hit, or stuns them if [Champion] blocked an immobilizing effect with this ability.

ability.name: Urchin Strike
ability.description: [Champion] dashes through his target, dealing magic damage and applying on hit effects.

ability.name: Hero's Entrance
ability.description: [Champion] designates an ally's position as his landing spot, granting all allies in the area a magic shield. After a delay [Champion] smashes down location, knocking up nearby enemies.

Gangplank.name: Gangplank
Gangplank.title: the Saltwater Scourge
Gangplank.quote: "Neither the flames nor the depths could claim me."

ability.name: Powder Keg
ability.description: [Champion] uncovers a powder keg at target location. If he attacks it, it explodes, spreading the attack's damage to enemies in the area, slowing them.

Garen.name: Garen
Garen.title: The Might of Demacia
Garen.quote: "My heart and sword always for Demacia."

ability.name: Decisive Strike
ability.description: [Champion] gains a burst of Move Speed, breaking free of all slows affecting him. His next attack strikes a vital area of his foe, dealing bonus damage and silencing them.

Gnar.name: Gnar
Gnar.title: the Missing Link
Gnar.quote: Gnar drops upside down and playfully flaunts the skull he carries around.

ability.name: Hop / Crunch
ability.description: [Champion] leaps to a location and bounces off the head of any unit he lands on, traveling further.Mega [Champion] is too large to bounce and instead lands with earth-shattering force, dealing damage in an area around him.

ability.name: Drunken Rage
ability.description: [Champion] guzzles down brew from his cask for 1 second. After finishing, he becomes drunkenly empowered, dealing magic damage to all nearby enemies on his next basic attack and reducing damage received.

ability.name: Quickdraw
ability.description: [Champion] dashes forward gaining an Armor boost for several seconds. If [Champion] dashes towards an enemy champion, gain two stacks of True Grit instead. Hitting enemies with basic attacks lowers the cooldown of this skill and refreshes the resistance boost.

ability.name: Needlework
ability.description: [Champion] hurls a needle that slows enemies hit, deals magic damage, and applies A Thousand Cuts to champions hit. This ability can be cast up to two more times, with each cast throwing additional needles and dealing more damage. [Champion] must hit an enemy between each cast to unlock the next one.

Hecarim.name: Hecarim
Hecarim.title: the Shadow of War
Hecarim.quote: "Behold, the might of the Shadow Isles."

ability.name: Onslaught of Shadows
ability.description: [Champion] summons spectral riders and charges forward, dealing magic damage in a line. [Champion] creates a shockwave when he finishes his charge, causing nearby enemies to flee in terror.

ability.name: UPGRADE!!!
ability.description: [Champion] invents an upgrade, causing his next spell to have increased effects.

Hwei.name: Hwei
Hwei.title: the Visionary
Hwei.quote: "A painter meets their subject eye to eye."

ability.name: Subject: Serenity
ability.description: [Champion] envisions a series of serenities, allowing him to paint invigorating settings.This ability replaces [Champion]'s abilities with utility abilities: Fleeting Current, Pool of Reflection, and Stirring Lights.

Illaoi.name: Illaoi
Illaoi.title: the Kraken Priestess
Illaoi.quote: "I'm not big on sermonsâ€”broken bones teach better lessons."

ability.name: Harsh Lesson
ability.description: [Champion] leaps to her target, dealing physical damage and causing nearby Tentacles to also swing at the target.

ability.name: Bladesurge
ability.description: [Champion] dashes forward to strike her target, healing herself. If the target is Marked or dies to Bladesurge, its cooldown refreshes.

ability.name: Daisy!
ability.description: [Champion] summons his Sentinel friend Daisy to fight with him. Re-cast command Daisy to attack or move.

ability.name: Howling Gale
ability.description: By creating a localized change in pressure and temperature, [Champion] is able to create a small storm that grows in size with time. She can activate the spell again to release the storm. On release this storm will fly towards the direction it was cast in, dealing damage and knocking away any enemies in its path.

Jax.name: Jax
Jax.title: Grandmaster at Arms
Jax.quote: Jax yawns. "Looks like I'll be carrying more than my own weight today."

ability.name: Grandmaster-at-Arms
ability.description: Every third consecutive attack deals additional Magic Damage. Additionally, [Champion] can activate this ability to deal damage around himself and strengthen his resolve, increasing his Armor and Magic Resist for a short duration.

ability.name: To the Skies! / Shock Blast
ability.description: Hammer Stance: Leaps to an enemy dealing physical damage and slowing enemies.Cannon Stance: Fires an orb of electricity that detonates upon hitting an enemy (or reaching the end of its path) dealing physical damage to all enemies hit.

Jhin.name: Jhin
Jhin.title: the Virtuoso
Jhin.quote: "In carnage, I bloom, like a flower in the dawn."

ability.name: Dancing Grenade
ability.description: [Champion] launches a magical cartridge at an enemy. It can hit up to four targets and gains damage each time it kills.

Jinx.name: Jinx
Jinx.title: the Loose Cannon
Jinx.quote: "Rules are made to be broken... like buildings! Or people!"

ability.name: Switcheroo!
ability.description: [Champion] modifies her basic attacks by swapping between Pow-Pow, her minigun and Fishbones, her rocket launcher. Attacks with Pow-Pow grant Attack Speed, while attacks with Fishbones deal area of effect damage, gain increased range, but drain Mana and attack slower.

ability.name: Rend
ability.description: Attacks impale their targets with spears. Activate to rip the spears out, slowing and dealing escalating damage.

ability.name: Focused Resolve
ability.description: [Champion] creates a tether between herself and a targeted enemy, dealing damage and revealing them. If the tether is not broken, the enemy will be rooted and damaged again.Mantra Bonus: [Champion] strengthens the link, healing herself and extending the root duration.

Karthus.name: Karthus
Karthus.title: the Deathsinger
Karthus.quote: "Agony, ecstasy, peace. Every passing has a beauty all its own."

ability.name: Requiem
ability.description: After channeling for 3 seconds, [Champion] deals damage to all enemy champions.

Kassadin.name: Kassadin
Kassadin.title: the Void Walker
Kassadin.quote: "The balance of power must be preserved."

ability.name: Null Sphere
ability.description: [Champion] fires an orb of void energy at a target, dealing damage and interrupting channels. The excess energy forms around himself, granting a temporary shield that absorbs magic damage.

ability.name: Death Lotus
ability.description: [Champion] becomes a flurry of blades, dealing massive magic damage while she channels to the 3 nearest enemy champions.

ability.name: Starfire Spellblade
ability.description: Passive: [Champion]'s celestial sword, Virtue, deals bonus magic damage to enemies she attacks.Active: [Champion]'s next attack smites her target with celestial fire, dealing bonus damage proportionate to their missing health.

ability.name: Blade's Reach
ability.description: [Champion] damages and slows targets in a line.

ability.name: Thundering Shuriken
ability.description: [Champion] throws a fast moving shuriken towards a location, causing damage and adding a Mark of the Storm to any opponent that it hits.

ability.name: Lamb's Respite
ability.description: Lamb grants all living things inside a zone a respite from death. Until the effect ends, nothing can die. At the end, units are healed.

Kled.name: Kled
Kled.title: the Cantankerous Cavalier
Kled.quote: "I find courage unpredictable. It's total insanity you can rely on!"

ability.name: Violent Tendencies
ability.description: [Champion] gains massive attack speed for four attacks. The fourth attack deals more damage.

ability.name: Shield of Daybreak
ability.description: [Champion] uses her shield to perform her next basic attack, dealing bonus magic damage and stunning the target.

ability.name: Swirlseed
ability.description: [Champion] hurls a seed that damages and slows those it lands on. If it doesn't hit anything, it will continue rolling until it hits a wall or target.

Lissandra.name: Lissandra
Lissandra.title: the Ice Witch
Lissandra.quote: "I will bury the world in ice."

ability.name: Ring of Frost
ability.description: Freezes nearby enemies in ice, dealing magic damage and rooting them.

Lucian.name: Lucian
Lucian.title: the Purifier
Lucian.quote: "Everybody dies. Some just need a little help."

ability.name: The Culling
ability.description: [Champion] unleashes a torrent of shots from his weapons.

ability.name: Wild Growth
ability.description: [Champion] enlarges an ally, knocking nearby enemies into the air and granting the ally a large amount of bonus health. For the next few seconds, that ally gains an aura that slows nearby enemies.

Lux.name: Lux
Lux.title: the Lady of Luminosity
Lux.quote: "But all my light puns would've brightened your day."

ability.name: Lucent Singularity
ability.description: Fires an anomaly of twisted light to an area, which slows nearby enemies. [Champion] can detonate it to damage enemies in the area of effect.

Malphite.name: Malphite
Malphite.title: Shard of the Monolith
Malphite.quote: "I'm moving as fast as I can."

ability.name: Seismic Shard
ability.description: [Champion] sends a shard of the earth through the ground at his foe, dealing damage upon impact and stealing Move Speed for 3 seconds.

ability.name: Nether Grasp
ability.description: [Champion] channels the essence of the Void to suppress an enemy champion over a zone of damaging negative energy.

ability.name: Sapling Toss
ability.description: [Champion] flings a sapling to the target area to stand guard. More effective in brush.

Milio.name: Milio
Milio.title: The Gentle Flame
Milio.quote: "Stick with me! I'll keep you warm." Fuemigo cheers.

ability.name: Cozy Campfire
ability.description: Create an empowering zone that heals allies and increases attack range to those inside. The zone follows the ally nearest to the cast point.

ability.name: Obliterate
ability.description: [Champion] smashes the ground with his mace dealing damage to each enemy struck. Damage is increased when hitting a single enemy.

Morgana.name: Morgana
Morgana.title: the Fallen
Morgana.quote: "I am bound, but I will not break."

ability.name: Dark Binding
ability.description: [Champion] binds an enemy in place with dark magic, forcing them to feel the pain they've caused and dealing magic damage.

Naafiri.name: Naafiri
Naafiri.title: the Hound of a Hundred Bites

ability.name: The Call of the Pack
ability.description: [Champion] empowers her pack and spawns additional packmates, instantly receiving a burst of speed and vision and gaining a shield the first time she hits another champion.After killing another champion for the first time, all effects are refreshed.

Nami.name: Nami
Nami.title: the Tidecaller
Nami.quote: "I decide what the tide will bring."

ability.name: Tidecaller's Blessing
ability.description: Empowers an allied champion for a short duration. The ally's basic attacks and spells deal bonus magic damage and slow the target.

Nasus.name: Nasus
Nasus.title: the Curator of the Sands
Nasus.quote: "The cycle of life and death continues,we will live,they will die."

ability.name: Siphoning Strike
ability.description: [Champion] strikes his foe, dealing damage and increasing the power of his future Siphoning Strikes if he slays his target.

ability.name: Dredge Line
ability.description: [Champion] hurls his anchor forward.  Colliding with an enemy pulls them and [Champion] together, dealing magic damage.  Colliding with terrain pulls [Champion] towards it.

ability.name: Tangle-Barbs
ability.description: [Champion] slings a tangle that damage and root everything it passes through. If the tangle kills an enemy or passes through a champion, it becomes larger, faster, and roots for longer.

ability.name: Primal Surge / Swipe
ability.description: In human form, [Champion] channels the spirit of the cougar to heal her allies and imbue them with Attack Speed for a short duration. As a cougar, she claws in a direction, dealing damage to enemies in front of her.

ability.name: Jubilant Veil
ability.description: [Champion] envelops herself in mist, increasing her movement speed and allowing her to gracefully dodge all incoming attacks. Any allies she touches during the mist's duration will also gain this effect.

ability.name: Unspeakable Horror
ability.description: [Champion] plants a nightmare into his target's mind, dealing damage each second and applying fear to the target if they do not get out of range by the end of the duration.

ability.name: Undertow
ability.description: [Champion] throws an axe into the ground at a target location, dealing damage to enemies it passes through and reducing their Armor and Move Speed. If [Champion] picks up the axe, the ability's cooldown is reset.

Orianna.name: Orianna
Orianna.title: the Lady of Clockwork
Orianna.quote: "We will kill your enemies. That will be fun."

ability.name: Command: Protect
ability.description: [Champion] commands her Ball to attach to an allied champion, Shielding them and dealing magic damage to any enemies it passes through on the way. Additionally, the Ball grants additional Armor and Magic Resist to the champion it is attached to.

Ornn.name: Ornn
Ornn.title: The Fire below the Mountain
Ornn.quote: "I have fur. It is soft. Do not hug me."

ability.name: Call of the Forge God
ability.description: [Champion] summons a massive elemental at a location which travels toward him with increasing speed. Enemies run over by the elemental take damage, are slowed and are made Brittle. [Champion] can recast the ability to charge into the elemental, redirecting it in the direction he hits it, causing the elemental to affect any enemies it runs over to be knocked up, dealing the same damage and re-applying Brittle.

ability.name: Comet Spear
ability.description: [Champion] either thrusts his spear or throws his spear in the chosen direction.

Poppy.name: Poppy
Poppy.title: Keeper of the Hammer
Poppy.quote: "I'm no heroâ€”just a Yordle with a hammer."

ability.name: Keeper's Verdict
ability.description: [Champion] channels a hammer strike that knocks enemies very far away.

ability.name: Phantom Undertow
ability.description: [Champion] dashes and leaves behind a phantom that will return to him, stunning enemy champions along its path.

ability.name: Audacity
ability.description: [Champion] dashes to an enemy, damaging them.

ability.name: Vault
ability.description: [Champion] dashes to an enemy, dealing physical damage and slowing the target's Move Speed. Upon reaching the target, she leaps off the target, briefly interrupting it, and lands near her maximum Attack Range away from the target.

ability.name: Gleaming Quill
ability.description: Flings a magical feather that deals magic damage. Striking a champion or epic monster enables [Champion] to heal his allies.

Rammus.name: Rammus
Rammus.title: the Armordillo
Rammus.quote: The voice-over for  Durian Defender Rammus is not available as unique set of audio files (the audio is directly pitched in-game from the base voice-over by the audio engine).

ability.name: Frenzying Taunt
ability.description: [Champion] taunts an enemy champion or monster into a reckless assault against him. Additionally, he gains increased Attack Speed for a short time, but this bonus is extended by having any of his other spells active.

Rell.name: Rell
Rell.title: the Iron Maiden
Rell.quote: "Nothing gets in, no one gets out."

ability.name: Shattering Strike
ability.description: [Champion] deals magic damage to units in a line, breaking their shields and stunning them.

ability.name: Ruthless Predator
ability.description: [Champion] slashes his target twice, dealing moderate physical damage and stuns them for 0.75 seconds. If [Champion] has more than 50 Fury, he slashes his target three times, destroying damage shields on the target, dealing high physical damage, and stunning them for 1.5 seconds.

ability.name: Bola Strike
ability.description: [Champion] throws a bola, slowing the first target hit for a short duration.Ferocity effect: roots the target.

ability.name: Ki Burst
ability.description: [Champion] emits a Ki Burst, damaging and stunning nearby enemies.

ability.name: The Equalizer
ability.description: [Champion] fires off a group of rockets, creating a wall of flames that damages and slows enemies.

ability.name: Rune Prison
ability.description: [Champion] traps a target in a cage of runes, damaging them and slowing their movement. If the target has Flux on it, they are instead rooted.

ability.name: Wild Rush
ability.description: [Champion] dashes through an enemy (including structures), slashing enemies she passes through and gaining Attack Speed. Killing an enemy champion refreshes this ability's cooldown.

ability.name: Arctic Assault
ability.description: [Champion] charges forward, knocking enemies into the air. The charge stops after hitting an enemy champion.

Senna.name: Senna
Senna.title: the Redeemer
Senna.quote: "No one fights alone in the Mist."

ability.name: Dawning Shadow
ability.description: [Champion] calls upon the relic stones of fallen Sentinels, splitting her relic cannon into a holy array of shadow and light. She then fires a global beam that shields allies from harm, while damaging enemies caught in the center.

ability.name: Surround Sound
ability.description: [Champion] Shields and Hastes nearby allies. If she is already Shielded she will Heal nearby allies as well.

Sett.name: Sett
Sett.title: the Boss
Sett.quote: "'Ey, never pick a fight you can't win."

ability.name: Knuckle Down
ability.description: [Champion]'s next two attacks deal additional damage based off of the target's max health. [Champion] also gains Move Speed while moving towards enemy champions.

ability.name: Jack In The Box
ability.description: [Champion] creates a hidden animated Jack-in-the-Box. When triggered, it will fear and attack nearby enemies.

ability.name: Stand United
ability.description: [Champion] shields target allied champion from incoming damage, and soon after teleports to their location.

ability.name: Twin Bite
ability.description: [Champion] strikes twice on her next attack and grants herself Attack Speed for her next attacks. Basic attacks reduce the cooldown of Twin Bite by 0.5 seconds.Dragon Form: Twin Bite cleaves all units in front of [Champion].

ability.name: Insanity Potion
ability.description: [Champion] drinks a potent brew of chemicals, granting him increased combat stats, and making his Poison Trail apply Grievous Wounds.

ability.name: Decimating Smash
ability.description: [Champion] charges a powerful swing in an area in front of himself that will deal damage to enemies when released. If he charges for enough time, enemies hit by the swing will also be knocked up and stunned.

Sivir.name: Sivir
Sivir.title: the Battle Mistress
Sivir.quote: "I always take my toll; blood, or gold."

ability.name: Boomerang Blade
ability.description: [Champion] hurls her crossblade like a boomerang, dealing damage each way.

Skarner.name: Skarner
Skarner.title: the Primordial Sovereign
Skarner.quote: "I am the vanguard of Ixtal's protection."

ability.name: Seismic Bastion
ability.description: [Champion] gains a shield and creates an earthquake whose shockwave damages and slows foes.

Smolder.name: Smolder
Smolder.title: the Fiery Fledgling
Smolder.quote: "I heard that the royal family of Camaroar used to offer rings to my ancestors. Ha, those things must've been humongous."

ability.name: Super Scorcher Breath
ability.description: [Champion] breathes fire on an enemy. As he gains more stacks, this ability becomes more powerful.

ability.name: Aria of Perseverance
ability.description: [Champion] plays the Aria of Perseverance, sending out protective melodies, healing [Champion] and a nearby wounded ally. [Champion] gains a temporary aura that grants allies tagged by the zone a temporary shield.

ability.name: Equinox
ability.description: Creates a zone at a location that silences all enemies inside. When the zone expires, all enemies still inside are rooted.

ability.name: Vision of Empire
ability.description: [Champion] opens a demon eye that deals damage and slows enemies. Champions hit are revealed and also grant [Champion] a Soul Fragment.

ability.name: Chain Lash
ability.description: [Champion] lashes his chains out, intersecting at his targeted location dealing damage to and slowing enemies. After a delay, magical energy explodes from the intersection point dealing damage.

ability.name: Dark Sphere
ability.description: [Champion] conjures a Dark Sphere dealing magic damage. The sphere remains and can be manipulated by her other powers.

ability.name: Unraveled Earth
ability.description: [Champion] creates a slowing minefield. If enemies dash through it or are knocked through it, the mines explode and stun them.

ability.name: Rake
ability.description: [Champion] sends out a volley of daggers that then return back to him, dealing physical damage every time it passes through an enemy. The returning blades deal bonus damage and slow units hit.

Taric.name: Taric
Taric.title: the Shield of Valoran
Taric.quote: "That glimmer of hope you see, that's me."

ability.name: Dazzle
ability.description: [Champion] readies a beam of starlight that, after a brief delay, deals magic damage and stuns enemies.

ability.name: Noxious Trap
ability.description: [Champion] throws an explosive poisonous trap using one of the mushrooms stored in his pack. If an enemy steps on the trap, it will release a poisonous cloud, slowing enemies and damaging them over time. If [Champion] throws a mushroom onto another mushroom it will bounce, gaining additional range.

ability.name: Dark Passage
ability.description: [Champion] throws out a lantern that shields nearby allied Champions from damage. Allies can click the lantern to dash to [Champion].

Tristana.name: Tristana
Tristana.title: the Yordle Gunner
Tristana.quote: "Once a Bandle gunner, always a Bandle gunner!"

ability.name: Rapid Fire
ability.description: [Champion] fires her weapon rapidly, increasing her Attack Speed for a short time.

Trundle.name: Trundle
Trundle.title: the Troll King
Trundle.quote: "I'm troll judge, troll jury, and execu... troll!"

ability.name: Subjugate
ability.description: [Champion] immediately steals a percent of his target's Health, Armor and Magic Resistance. Over the next 4 seconds the amount of Health, Armor, and Magic Resistance stolen is doubled.

ability.name: Undying Rage
ability.description: [Champion]'s lust for battle becomes so strong that he is unable to die, no matter how wounded he becomes.

Twitch.name: Twitch
Twitch.title: the Plague Rat
Twitch.quote: "What doesn't kill you just isn't finished yet."

ability.name: Venom Cask
ability.description: [Champion] hurls a cask of venom that explodes in an area, slowing targets and applying deadly venom to the target.

ability.name: Wingborne Storm
ability.description: [Champion] surrounds himself in a glacial storm, damaging and slowing nearby enemies. Recast: Empower and unleash the storm, causing it to track enemies and deal additional damage.

Urgot.name: Urgot
Urgot.title: the Dreadnought
Urgot.quote: "You cannot know strength... Until you are broken."

ability.name: Purge
ability.description: [Champion] slows himself while he unloads his weapon on nearby enemies. Prioritizes enemy champions [Champion] has recently struck with other abilities and triggers Echoing Flames.

ability.name: Piercing Arrow
ability.description: [Champion] readies and then fires a powerful shot that gains extra range and damage the longer he spends preparing to fire.

Vayne.name: Vayne
Vayne.title: the Night Hunter
Vayne.quote: "Let us hunt those who have fallen to darkness."

ability.name: Tumble
ability.description: [Champion] tumbles, maneuvering to carefully place her next shot. Her next attack deals bonus damage.

ability.name: Event Horizon
ability.description: [Champion] twists the edges of space, creating a cage that Stuns enemies that pass through.

ability.name: Shadow Surge
ability.description: Fire a missile that marks an enemy champion.  Recast to dash to them and deal damage.

ability.name: Denting Blows
ability.description: [Champion]'s punches break her opponent's Armor, dealing bonus damage and granting her Attack Speed.

ability.name: Spectral Maw
ability.description: [Champion] charges up before dashing forward, releasing a ball of concentrated Black Mist that stuns the first enemy hit.

ability.name: Death Ray
ability.description: [Champion] uses his robotic arm to fire a chaos beam that cuts across the field in a line, dealing damage to all enemies in its path.Augment: An explosion follows the Death Ray's wake, dealing magic damage.

ability.name: Tides of Blood
ability.description: [Champion] pays his own health to charge up a reservoir of blood which, when released, deals damage in the area around him but can be blocked by enemy units.

ability.name: Thundering Smash
ability.description: [Champion] gains speed towards enemies, Stunning and damaging the first one he Attacks.

ability.name: Primal Howl
ability.description: [Champion] gains damage reduction for 2.5 seconds. At the end, or if re-activated, he howls, causing nearby enemies to flee for 1 second.

Xayah.name: Xayah
Xayah.title: the Rebel
Xayah.quote: "I can never resist an invitation to dance."

ability.name: Bladecaller
ability.description: [Champion] calls back all her dropped Feathers dealing damage and rooting enemies.

ability.name: Rite of the Arcane
ability.description: [Champion] immobilizes himself and gains numerous long-range barrages.

Yasuo.name: Yasuo
Yasuo.title: the Unforgiven
Yasuo.quote: "Death is like the windâ€”always by my side."

ability.name: Sweeping Blade
ability.description: Dashes through target enemy, dealing magic damage. Each cast increases subsequent dash's damage, up to a max amount.Cannot be re-cast on the same enemy for a few seconds.If Steel Tempest is cast while dashing, it will strike as a circle.

ability.name: Soul Unbound
ability.description: [Champion]'s spirit leaves his body behind, gaining Move Speed. When this ability ends, [Champion]'s spirit is forced back to his body and he repeats a portion of the damage he dealt as a spirit.

Yorick.name: Yorick
Yorick.title: Shepherd of Souls
Yorick.quote: "Fear not... I will make use of your corpse."

ability.name: Dark Procession
ability.description: [Champion] summons a destructible wall at target location that will block enemy movement.

ability.name: Zoomies
ability.description: Shields [Champion] and boosts Move Speed and Attack Speed. If she's attached, she passes it to her ally instead.

ability.name: Let's Bounce!
ability.description: [Champion] bounces four times, knocking up enemies hit and slowing them.

ability.name: Shadow Slash
ability.description: [Champion] and his Shadows slash, dealing damage to nearby enemies. Enemies hit by a Shadow's slash are slowed.

ability.name: Burst Fire
ability.description: Burst Fire shoots a burst of 7 rounds that deal attack damage to the first enemy hit. This Ability is treated as an Attack.

ability.name: Bouncing Bomb
ability.description: [Champion] throws a bouncing bomb that deals magic damage.

ability.name: Chronoshift
ability.description: [Champion] places a protective time rune on an allied champion, teleporting the champion back in time if they take lethal damage.

ability.name: Portal Jump
ability.description: Blink to a nearby position for 1 second. Then blink back.

ability.name: Rampant Growth
ability.description: [Champion] plants a seed, lasting up to 60 seconds. Deadly Spines and Grasping Roots cast near seeds will turn them into plants who fight for [Champion]. [Champion] can store multiple seeds at once, and killing enemies reduces Rampant Growth's recharge time.

AurelionSol.name: Aurelion Sol
AurelionSol.title: The Star Forger
AurelionSol.quote: "In a constantly shifting cosmos, a world this static is... refreshing."

ability.name: Astral Flight
ability.description: [Champion] flies over terrain in a targeted direction. While in this state, he can cast other abilities. Breath of Light no longer has a cooldown or maximum channel duration and deals increased damage while flying.Astral Flight's remaining cooldown is reduced whenever an enemy champion dies after being recently damaged by [Champion].Stardust increases Astral Flight's maximum range.

Belveth.name: Bel'Veth
Belveth.title: the Empress of the Void
Belveth.quote: "I am the voice of the silence."

ability.name: Above and Below
ability.description: [Champion] slams her tail to the ground, damaging, knocking up, and slowing her enemies.

Chogath.name: Cho'Gath
Chogath.title: the Terror of the Void
Chogath.quote: "You'd wish the world you know to end! Yeeeesssss..."

ability.name: Feral Scream
ability.description: [Champion] unleashes a terrible scream at enemies in a cone, dealing magic damage and Silencing enemies for a few seconds.

ability.name: Heart Zapper
ability.description: [Champion] electrocutes himself, dealing persistent damage to nearby enemies and storing a portion of damage he takes. At the end of the duration or on Recast, [Champion] deals a burst of damage to nearby enemies. If the burst hit an enemy, he heals a percentage of the stored damage.

JarvanIV.name: Jarvan IV
JarvanIV.title: the Exemplar of Demacia
JarvanIV.quote: "By my will, this shall be finished."

ability.name: Dragon Strike
ability.description: [Champion] extends his lance, dealing physical damage and lowering the Armor of enemies in its path. Additionally, this will pull Jarvan to his Demacian Standard, knocking up enemies in his path.

KSante.name: K'Sante
KSante.title: the Pride of Nazumah
KSante.quote: "Better to fight, than to live in fear."

ability.name: All Out
ability.description: [Champion] knocks an enemy back, launching them through any wall in their path. Then, [Champion] goes All Out and dashes after them, gaining increased damage, healing, and transformed abilities at the cost of reduced defenses.

Kaisa.name: Kai'Sa
Kaisa.title: Daughter of the Void
Kaisa.quote: "Are you the hunter... or the prey?"

ability.name: Supercharge
ability.description: [Champion] briefly increases her Move Speed, then increases her Attack Speed.Living Weapon: Supercharge is upgraded to briefly grant Invisibility.

ability.name: Void Assault
ability.description: Each rank allows [Champion] to evolve one of his abilities, giving it a unique additional effect. When activated, [Champion] becomes Invisible, triggering Unseen Threat and increasing Move Speed. If he chooses to Evolve Adaptive Cloaking, Void Assault gains increased Invisibility duration, and an additional use.

ability.name: Caustic Spittle
ability.description: [Champion] launches a corrosive projectile which deals magic damage and corrodes the target's armor and magic resist for a short time. [Champion] also gains additional attack speed.

Leblanc.name: LeBlanc
Leblanc.title: the Deceiver
Leblanc.quote: "The Black Rose shall bloom once more."

ability.name: Distortion
ability.description: [Champion] dashes to a location, dealing damage to enemies near her destination. For the next 4 seconds, activate Distortion again to return [Champion] to her starting location.

ability.name: Dragon's Rage
ability.description: [Champion] performs a powerful roundhouse kick launching his target back, dealing physical damage to the target and any enemies they collide with. Enemies the target collides with are knocked into the air for a short duration. This technique was taught to him by Jesse Perring, although [Champion] does not kick players off the map.

ability.name: Meditate
ability.description: [Champion] rejuvenates his body by focus of mind, restoring Health and taking reduced damage for a short time. In addition, [Champion] will gain stacks of Double Strike and pause the remaining duration on Wuju Style and Highlander for each second he channels.

Mel.name: Mel
Mel.title: the Soul's Reflection
Mel.quote: "Mel Medarda is the presumed heir of the Medarda family, once one of the most pow..."

ability.name: Golden Eclipse
ability.description:
[Champion] strikes all enemies marked with Overwhelm regardless of their distance from her, dealing additional damage for each stack of Overwhelm.

Ranks of Golden Eclipse increase Overwhelm's damage.

ability.name: Bullet Time
ability.description: [Champion] channels a barrage of bullets into a cone in front of her, dealing large amounts of damage to enemies. Each wave of Bullet Time can critically strike

ability.name: Warrior Trickster
ability.description: [Champion] becomes Invisible and dashes in a direction, leaving behind a clone that will attack nearby enemies.

Nunu.name: Nunu & Willump
Nunu.title: the Boy and His Yeti
Nunu.quote: "Once upon a time, there was a boy who wanted to prove he was a hero by slaying a..."

ability.name: Snowball Barrage
ability.description: Nunu throws multiple snowballs that damage enemies.  When he's finished, Willump roots any champions or large monsters that were hit by a snowball.

ability.name: Furious Bite / Tunnel
ability.description: [Champion] bites her target, dealing bonus damage if she has max Fury.While Burrowed, [Champion] creates a re-usable, long lasting tunnel. Enemies can destroy it by standing on top of either entrance.

Renata.name: Renata Glasc
Renata.title: the Chem-Baroness
Renata.quote: "It's 'Miss Glasc'... if you value your life."

ability.name: Handshake
ability.description: Renata sends out a missile rooting the first enemy hit, and can recast the ability to throw the unit in a direction.

TahmKench.name: Tahm Kench
TahmKench.title: The River King
TahmKench.quote: "Call me king, call me demon. Water forgets the names of the drowned."

ability.name: Abyssal Dive
ability.description: Dive down and then re-appear at target location, damaging and knocking up all enemies in an area.

ability.name: Stacked Deck
ability.description: Every 4 attacks, [Champion] deals bonus damage. In addition, his Attack Speed is increased.

ability.name: Void Rift
ability.description: [Champion] opens a rift to the void that deals an initial burst of damage, then explodes for a second burst of damage after a delay.

ability.name: Audacious Charge
ability.description: [Champion] charges to an enemy, gaining increased Attack Speed and dealing damage to all enemies in the area, slowing them briefly. Audacious Charge gains increased range against Challenged targets.

Yunara.name: Yunara
Yunara.title: the Unbroken Faith
Yunara.quote: "Unwavering in her devotion to Ionia, Yunara has spent centuries cloistered away ..."

ability.name: Transcend One's Self
ability.description: [Champion] enters a Transcendent State that upgrades her basic Abilities.

Zaahen.name: Zaahen
Zaahen.title: The Unsundered
Zaahen.quote: "A fallen god wielding both divine and profane power, Zaahen hunts his fellow Dar..."

ability.name: Grim Deliverance
ability.description: [Champion] rises then stabs downward, damaging enemies and healing for a portion of the damage dealt.
